thread.title: Roadworks damaging trade say businesses | Channel

author: itv.com
title: Roadworks damaging trade say businesses | Channel
text:
Businesses in St Martin in Jersey say roadworks in the area are damaging their trade.
Improvements to the roads from Trinity to Gorey, that started today, have meant people can't access a local pub without asking workmen if they can access roads.
Transport and Technical Services said today they are constantly working to improve the situation.
The owner of The Royal says signs to say the pub is open would be ideal because it's hitting trade.
Play video Last updated Tue 25 Aug 2015 Read more 2 updates Trinity to Gorey resurfacing work is damaging trade say businesses Travel Jersey
